name: DeepDark Habitica 1.2.2
description: Dark & Compact UserStyle for the new Habitica front end. Based on the popular DeepDark Firefox and Thunderbird theme. This style includes patches for the existing Habitica UI bugs and a number of advanced user options.
additional_info:
Release 1.2.2
- Update Compact Setting
- Update Extra Compact Setting

Release 1.2.1
- Update Filter Hider 

Release 1.2
- Vertical Skills Draw

Release 1.1.1:
- Refined Extra-Compact
- Refined Narrow Rewards

Release 1.1:
- Refined Compact Tasks
- Hide Filter Bar Option
- Narrow Rewards Option

Release 1.0:
- Bug fixes to main Habitica Front End
- DeepDark Color Scheme
- Compact Style
- Extra-Compact Style
- Hide Footer
- Advanced Style Settings
